initialise this Database connection

Parameters:
driver - driver name (example: ca.edbc.jdbc.EdbcDriver)
url - url of the database (example: jdbc:edbc://PC070:ME7/BCE_PC070::dbflomatis/INGRES)
user - user name for connection
password - user password for connection
